page.title: 07CLOTHES.
page.content: Boys and girls in 1985 like to choose their own clothes. The most popular shops visited by boys in my form are TOP MAN, C.& A. BURTON'S, DAILY TAILORS AND FOSTERS. Some boys also choose clothes from Mail Order Catalogues. When boys go out shopping for clothes, they normally spend Â£30 or less. They usually go to Halifax to buy their clothes. The most popular colours amongst boys are grey and black,not many boys like to wear very bright colours. They do like to wear expensive clothes, but this depends on what they are buying.Girls like to go shopping at these stores: C.&A. WASIMS, BEST SELLERS, LEWIS'S MARKS & SPENCERS, CHELSEA GIRL, and BURTONS. Mail order buying from catalogues is quite popular with girls. They go to Leeds, Huddersfield, Halifax and Bradford when they go shopping.
